EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I trust this email finds you very well.
Please find below links to our latest newsletter.
Online newsletter: http://www.bsg.org.cn/info/Quicklinks/Newsletters/en/
Download: http://www.bsg.org.cn/downloads/product_attachments/000000316_0.pdf
Thank you for your continuing support.
kind regards,
The British School of Guangzhou
+(8620) 8709 4788
www.bsg.org.cn
